source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video features a rainy, neon-lit urban environment at night, with futuristic buildings and bright advertisements. The camera angle is low, looking up at the cityscape, and a vehicle is present in the foreground. The scene is atmospheric, emphasizing the moody lighting and cyberpunk aesthetic.
